file_content.text: We'll be able to hold the line now, I'm certain.
You're back! Did it work? Are the stealth troopers dead? Oh, um, sorry. I'm just a bit on edge.
Your device did its part, I took care of the rest.
Your plan was sound.
It really worked? Hah! I can't believe it! You think I'll get a commendation?
There's nothing to fear now.
They went down fighting.
Those Republic dogs were hitting us mercilessly. I'm sure it was a real slug-out.
You guys really saved our skin; I wish I had a better way to show my appreciation, but I hope this does you all some good.
Thank you so much, my lord. I thought we were goners. Please take this as thanks. I wish I had something less... humble to offer.
I don't know what you normally work for, so sorry if this comes short, but it's everything I've got.
I can't believe they disbanded Intelligence, that was amazing. Take this, a little appreciation for what you do for us, sir.
I think we can handle it from here. Here, take this. You'll probably put it to better use than I will.
Please hurry, those stealth troopers are slaughtering us.
Watch how you walk around here! You'll end up shot in the back if you're not cautious!
Ahem, sorry. It's just a few highly tempting targets like you could draw attention to this position. The enemy hasn't spotted me yet.
Oh, I apologize for yelling, my lord, but I needed to warn you. We're getting hammered ahead of this position.
You're that bounty hunter who's been working with Darth Tormen, right? I could use a good hunter right now.
Sir, Private Shon, reporting. The situation's bad up ahead.
Sorry for yelling at you, but there are some dangerous forces lurking around here.
Our garrison holding the Green Jedi enclave is losing ground quickly. They don't stand a chance against the Republic's stealth troopers.
Our forces attempting to take the Green Jedi enclave are deadlocked; they keep getting outflanked by the Republic's stealth troopers.
What makes these stealth troopers so effective?
Stealth troopers?
They won't surprise me.
Wait, please. You don't understand, you'll never spot them before they've got you where they want you.
Why hide near the enclave?
I was my squad's tech specialist. I've been observing what I can about this new threat.
They're using some kind of cloaking technology that makes a stealth field generator look like a signal flare. But its weakness is that it's a little too good.
They can't even detect each other; they have to rely on their unit commanders for coordination.
We sever the head and watch the body thrash about.
Striking their leaders is key.
Exactly, my lord, and I think I've got a way to make clearing them out a lot easier.
They can't hope to best a Sith at a game of deception.
I'll teach them a lesson.
Very true, my lord. I have a suggestion for how you could do the most damage, if you'll permit.
I could nab those unit commanders for you.
Sounds right up my alley.
We're not really in a position to be taking prisoners, but I could use your help tracking them down.
I imagine that scrambling communications would be exceptionally effective in this case.
Tried electronic warfare yet?
That would slow them down, but they'd still have a huge advantage over us.
It's something to go on.
I'm not seeing an exploit.
I've modified this stealth field generator to disrupt fields rather than create them. All it needs is to be tuned to the right frequencies.
Scan a unit commander's tactical computer, and it should expose all of the stealth troopers under their command.
Synchronize this device with a unit commander's tactical computer and eliminate the unveiled stealth troopers, anything else?
Let me review the plan.
That's it exactly.
Time for payback.
Tear 'em apart, for my platoon.
I can't. [Refuse quest]
Okay... if you see any friendlies, send them my way.
Ah! Oh, whew, don't sneak up on me! There are stealth fighters stalking around here!
